[main:addi r1,r0,10, addi r2,r0,15, sw r2,-1(r1), add r2,r0,r1, jal init_array, add r2,r0,r1, jal sum_array, j exit, init_array:add r3,r0,r0, lw r4,-1(r2), init_loop:sw r3,0(r2), addi r3,r3,1, addi r2,r2,1, blt r3,r4,init_loop, jr r7, sum_array:add r3,r0,r0, lw r4,-1(r2), add r5,r0,r0, sum_loop:lw r6,0(r2), add r5,r5,r6, addi r2,r2,1, addi r3,r3,1, blt r3,r4,sum_loop, jr r7, exit:j exit]
